description: Riding on the NUS Enterpriseâ€™s Lean Launchpad program, this module is an elective to provide students with opportunities to participate & engage in real-world entrepreneurship, and in particular, learn how to commercialise an innovative idea. This is an experiential module that facilitates learning through practice. The students will learn out of the classroom as they talk to potential customers, partners and competitors to experience the uncertainty that comes with commercialising and creating new ventures.
title: Entrepreneurship Practicum
